abstract: G.E. would continue to hold 49 percent of NBC Universal at first, but would be expected to shed that over several years.
snippet: G.E. would continue to hold 49 percent of NBC Universal at first, but would be expected to shed that over several years.
lead_paragraph: General Electric and the cable giant Comcast have moved closer to a deal giving control of NBC Universal to Comcast, and a formal announcement could be made sometime next week, people briefed on the talks said Sunday.

headline.main: Comcast Said to Be Close to Gaining NBC Universal
headline.print_headline: Comcast Said to Be Close To Gaining NBC Universal

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Andrew Ross Sorkin

abstract: General Electric moved closer to a deal giving control of NBC Universal to the cable giant Comcast, and a formal announcement could be made sometime next week, The New York Times reported.
snippet: General Electric moved closer to a deal giving control of NBC Universal to the cable giant Comcast, and a formal announcement could be made sometime next week, The New York Times reported.
lead_paragraph: General Electric and the cable giant Comcast have moved closer to a deal giving control of NBC Universal to Comcast, and a formal announcement could be made sometime next week, The New York Times’s Michael J. de la Merced and Andrew Ross Sorkin reported, citing people briefed on the talks.

headline.main: Comcast Said to Be Close On NBC Universal
